Home.title: Hello, I am Jabin
Home.description: Full Stack Developer / Tech Enthusiast / Creator

whoAmI.title: Who Am I
whoAmI.paragraph1: Hi, I’m Jabin Chen — a Master’s graduate from the University of Auckland and a passionate developer who enjoys building impactful tech solutions. With hands-on experience in JavaScript, C#, and Python, I’ve developed full-stack applications using frameworks such as React, ASP.NET Core, and Node.js.
whoAmI.paragraph2: Driven by creativity and curiosity, I’m especially interested in how emerging technologies — particularly AI and cloud computing — can enhance user experiences and address real-world challenges. I’m always open to meaningful conversations about innovation and the future of technology.

item1.company: FRW Healthcare Limited & ICT Graduate School
item1.point1: Developed cross-platform UI with Swift (iOS) and React.js (Web); scalable RESTful APIs using Spring Boot.
item1.point2: Containerized applications with Docker, deployed on AWS with Nginx, and implemented CI/CD pipelines.
item1.point3: Enhanced pharmacy workflow efficiency by 40% through AI-driven automation and system performance tuning.

item2.description: Teaching Assistant for Computer Science courses.
item2.point1: Evaluated and graded assignments for Principles of Programming, Software Fundamentals, and Computer Organisation.
item2.point2: Provided feedback and additional learning support to students, improving academic performance and understanding.

item3.description: Full Stack Developer for AI-integrated music web application.
item3.point1: Built full-stack app using MERN stack, integrating Spotify API for music playback and OpenAI API for conversational AI.
item3.point2: Implemented real-time chat with Socket.IO; optimized MongoDB for high concurrency in an Agile environment.

item4.description: Stock portfolio and AI news podcast system.
item4.point1: Developed responsive frontend with React and Tailwind; secure routing via context-based authentication.
item4.point2: Designed layered RESTful APIs with ASP.NET Core and EF Core; integrated DeepSeek and NewsAPI for financial summaries.
item4.point3: Converted summaries into podcasts using Azure TTS; deployed services via Docker and Azure App Service with CI/CD.

item5.point1: Built a responsive frontend using React.js and designed user flows in Figma.
item5.point2: Developed RESTful APIs with Python Flask to retrieve and serve production order documents.

education.title: Education
education.degree1: Master of Information Technology – University of Auckland
education.degree2: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science – University of Auckland

list.title: Medimate - AI-powered Medication Assistance
list.description: Developed an innovative application that automates medication purchases by extracting data from product images using AI-driven image recognition.

list.title: MusicChat - AI-Enhanced Social Music Platform
list.description: Built a full-stack web application integrating Spotify and OpenAI APIs, allowing users to review, chat, and discover music interactively.

list.title: COVID-19 Impact Analysis with Machine Learning
list.description: Conducted data mining on COVID-19's effect on education in Venezuela using CRISP-DM methodology, building ML models to predict school dropout rates.

Contact.description: I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision. Feel free to reach out!
